byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

abstract: DealBook Online; Deutsche Bank hires Goldman Sachs banker Celeste Guth to co-head global financial institutions group.
lead_paragraph: Celeste Guth will co-head of the global financial institutions group beside Tadhg Flood.

headline.main: Deutsche Bank Picks Goldman Executive as Bank and Insurance Adviser

snippet: Celeste Guth will co-head of the global financial institutions group beside Tadhg Flood.
